survey_name: AI-Powered Mental Wellness App User Feedback Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to gather user feedback on the effectiveness, usability, and overall satisfaction with AI-powered mental wellness apps to inform future improvements and feature development.

questions.question_text: How frequently do you use AI-powered mental wellness apps?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clarity. Ensure options cover a broad range of usage frequencies.

questions.question_text: Which features of AI-powered mental wellness apps do you find most useful? (Select all that apply)
questions.client_notes: Use checkboxes for multi-select functionality. Include an option for 'None of the above' to capture non-users.
